patthana22.10:1.1: Nakusalaṃ narūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato rūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana22.10:2.1: Nakusalaṃ nanarūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato narūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā pañca, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate pañca.
